WorkItem.Summary: Web Service Client Without Code Generation And app.config

Comments.Message:
Hello findy,

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to implement a Web Service client without app.config and code generation.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Team is triaging the sample topic.  I will keep you updated about the progress every week.  Please also understand that the free Sample Request Service is not for urgent sample requests.   If your request is urgent, please use Microsoft Professional Advisory Services.

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
